general.description: Entry to Shoden space is always guarded by armed stations, and Shoin is no exception. It lies on a short jump route to the Baartish, which, as a sshaad State, is not deemed very dangerous by the Shoden, except for advocating Complementarism, which is viewed as a treason of the entire sshaad species.
general.bar: Proud pilots and patrol officers on Shoden markings, joking on the "blobs invasion" and ready to fight any non-Sshaad who would dare to enter the bar
